content: {A小害羞}<style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, y-you're here~! Well mah, I looked it up, and, a party means we gotta dance...

content: {A害羞挠头}Not that I'm tired, I just ain't all that good at dancin'. Do you wanna take a break mah? I'm fine with endin' the party whenever ya say.
info: 月亮椅聚会-云果_主流程文本3

content: {A小害羞}O-Okey! I c-can't dance that well, but long as we're all havin' fun together, that's what counts, right mah?

content: {A害羞冒烟}Did I... make you look bad? I-I'll practice real hard for next time. So don't give up on me just yet, 'kay?

content: I can't dance, and it's too late to learn now... {A笑眯眯}but I sure know a thing or two 'bout aerobics!

content: {A期待}Thank you! I ain't been this happy in ages. Just you 'n' me — n-no no, I mean being here with both you and Esassani!

content: {A伸懒腰}Are we done mah? I-I'm not tired or anything. It's just, I've been doin' aerobics for ages, and my shoulders got all achy... Been a while since I had this much exercise.

content: Same sorta stretchin', makes you strong and healthy. And if it looks kinda funny... well, I can do Baduanjin too!

content: The more the merrier! {A挠头}<style=SizeSmall>How come Esassani's not in her PJs? Maybe I oughtta lend her mine...</style>

content: {A期待}I feel real lucky that my very first party was with you! N-Next time I'm gonna learn a bunch more dance moves!

content: <style=SizeSmall>If only I can keep up with your steps next time...</style> W-Well, I'd best head back and see if my new seeds are bein' behavin' themselves. {A打招呼}See ya!
